title: Need help with new puppy
body:
So I've been  feeding  my doggy Blue Buffalo Wilderness Grain-Free Rocky Mountain Recipe with steam Organic chicken breast. I wonder if it's ok and also what is the best cut of steak to feed a dog? I'm heading to Whole Foods this after noon to pick up some steaks for him.
http://www.auplod.com/u/padulo99c5d.jpeg
I also have 2 beds for him a small one and a big one from Serta.
http://www.auplod.com/u/oauldp99c5f.jpeg
http://www.auplod.com/u/aopdul99681.png
